title: Guardianship Forms (Family Court Act Article 6; S.C.P.A.; Social Services Law Section 384-B)
content:
Guardianship Forms (Family Court Act Article 6; S.C.P.A.; Social Services Law Section 384-B)

State Regulations

Form 6-1 - Petition for appointment as (guardian of person) (permanent guardian)

Form 6-1-c - Petition for appointment of kinship guardian [subsidized kinship guardian program] and/or permanent guardian

Form 6-2 - Guardianship of person of a minor

Form 6-3 - Guardianship-consent of person over 18 and preference of person over 14 regarding appointment of guardian

Form 6-4 - Waiver of process, renunciation or consent to (letters of guardianship) (standby guardianship)

Form 6-5 - Order appointing guardian of the person or permanent guardian

Form 6-5-a - Order appointing kinship guardian [subsidized kinship guardian program] and/or permanent guardian

Form 6-6 - Letters of guardianship of the person of a minor

Form 6-7 - Certificate of guardianship of person of a minor

Form 6-8 - Petition (appointment of standby guardian)

Form 6-9 - Order appointing standby guardian of a person

Form 6-10 - Determination of incapacity

Form 6-11 - Consent of petitioner (appointment of standby guardian)

Form TPR-1 - Termination of parental rights-permanent neglect

Form TPR-1a - Summons-termination of parental rights

Form TPR-1b - Affidavit of caseworker regarding persons entitled to notice of proceeding to terminate parental rights of child in foster care

Form TPR-2 - Findings of fact, conclusions of law and order of disposition-permanent neglect

Form TPR-2a - Findings of fact, conclusions of law and order of disposition-suspended judgment-permanent neglect

Form TPR-3 - Order dismissing petition requesting commitment of guardianship and custody

Form TPR-4 - Petition-termination of parental rights-parents deceased

Form TPR-5 - Findings of fact, conclusions of law and order of disposition-parents deceased

Form TPR-6 - Termination of parental rights-abandonment petition

Form TPR-7 - Findings of fact, conclusions of law and order of disposition-abandoned child

Form TPR-8 - Petition-termination of parental rights-mental illness or mental retardation of parents

Form TPR-9 - Findings of fact, conclusions of law and order of disposition-parents' mental illness or mental retardation

Form TPR-10 - Petition-termination of parental rights-severe or repeated child abuse

Form TPR-11 - Order of disposition-severe or repeated child abuse

Form TPR-12 - Affirmation regarding venue-termination of parental rights

Form TPR-13 - Termination of parental rights-determination of Family Court judge regarding venue

Form TPR-14 - Termination of parental rights-order regarding venue

Form TPR-15 - Petition to restore parental rights

Form TPR-16 - Order upon petition to modify order of disposition to restore parental rights

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
